mapper.update: UPDATE wvp_device SET update_time = #{updateTime}, custom_name = #{name}, dept_id = #{deptId}, password = #{password}, stream_mode = #{streamMode}, ip = #{ip}, sdp_ip = #{sdpIp}, port = #{port}, charset = #{charset}, ssrc_check = #{ssrcCheck}, as_message_channel = #{asMessageChannel}, broadcast_push_after_ack = #{broadcastPushAfterAck}, geo_coord_sys = #{geoCoordSys}, media_server_id = #{mediaServerId}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng}, address_map = #{addressMap} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT de.id, de.dept_id, de.device_id, coalesce(de.custom_name, de.name) as name, de.password, de.manufacturer, de.model, de.firmware, de.transport, de.stream_mode, de.ip, de.sdp_ip, de.local_ip, de.port, de.host_address, de.expires, de.register_time, de.keepalive_time, de.create_time, de.update_time, de.charset, de.subscribe_cycle_for_catalog, de.subscribe_cycle_for_mobile_position, de.mobile_position_submission_interval, de.subscribe_cycle_for_alarm, de.ssrc_check, de.as_message_channel, de.broadcast_push_after_ack, de.geo_coord_sys, de.on_line, de.lat, de.lng, de.address_map, d.dept_name FROM wvp_device de left join sys_dept d on de.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE de.on_line = true

SELECT id, device_id, COALESCE(custom_name, name) AS name, password, manufacturer, model, firmware, transport, stream_mode, ip, sdp_ip, local_ip, port, host_address, expires, register_time, keepalive_time, create_time, update_time, charset, subscribe_cycle_for_catalog, subscribe_cycle_for_mobile_position, mobile_position_submission_interval, subscribe_cycle_for_alarm, ssrc_check, as_message_channel, geo_coord_sys, on_line, media_server_id, broadcast_push_after_ack, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM wvp_device_channel dc WHERE dc.data_type = 1 AND dc.data_device_id = de.id) AS channel_count FROM wvp_device de WHERE de.device_id = #{deviceId}

SELECT de.id, de.dept_id, de.device_id, coalesce(de.custom_name, de.name) as name, de.password, de.manufacturer, de.model, de.firmware, de.transport, de.stream_mode, de.ip, de.sdp_ip, de.local_ip, de.port, de.host_address, de.expires, de.register_time, de.keepalive_time, de.create_time, de.update_time, de.charset, de.subscribe_cycle_for_catalog, de.subscribe_cycle_for_mobile_position, de.mobile_position_submission_interval, de.subscribe_cycle_for_alarm, de.ssrc_check, de.as_message_channel, de.broadcast_push_after_ack, de.geo_coord_sys, de.on_line, de.media_server_id, de.lat, de.lng, de.address_map, d.dept_name, (SELECT count(0) FROM wvp_device_channel dc WHERE dc.data_type = #{dataType} and dc.data_device_id= de.id) as channel_count FROM wvp_device de left join sys_dept d on de.dept_id = d.dept_id
and (de.dept_id = #{device.deptId} OR de.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.dept_id FROM sys_dept t WHERE find_in_set(#{device.deptId}, ancestors) ))
AND de.on_line = #{device.status}
AND de.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{device.name}, '%')
AND de.ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{device.ip}, '%')
AND de.manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{device.manufacturer}, '%')
${device.params.dataScope}
ORDER BY de.create_time DESC
